data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 484,900 people living in Matagalpa through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Matagalpa, Nicaragua
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 208,133 believers in the state of Matagalpa.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Matagalpa, Nicaragua know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Matagalpa, Nicaragua need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Matagalpa, Nicaragua.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Matagalpa, Nicaragua.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the state of Matagalpa, Nicaragua has a population of 484,900.

We estimate Matagalpa has 208,133 people who might know Jesus, 258,239 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 18,528 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Matagalpa, Nicaragua will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
